org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.topology

Class TopologyLinkDataChangeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.topology.TopologyLinkDataChangeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, DataChangeListener<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>

    public class TopologyLinkDataChangeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataChangeListener
    Listens to data change events on topology links Link and maintains a topology graph using provided NetworkGraphService NetworkGraphService. It refreshes the graph after a delay(default 10 sec) to accommodate burst of change events if they come in bulk. This is to avoid continuous refresh of graph on a series of change events in short time.

      Constructors
